Basic usage

<span x-dump="Math.abs (-2) + 43"></span>
<span x-dump="[1,2,3,4].filter ( x => x % 2 == 0)"></span>
<span x-dump="'foo' + 'bar'"></span>

Reactive and non-reactive

Reactive

<div x-dump="l"></div>

Non-reactive

<div x-dump="l" static></div>

Click on "static" to update to the most recent version
Click the button to add data to array l.

Limiting output

Default limit of 200 characters

<div x-dump="Array.from(Array(100).keys())"></div>


Custom limit of 50 characters

<div x-dump="Array.from(Array(100).keys())" limit="50"></div>


Unlimited output

<div x-dump="Array.from(Array(100).keys())" limit="-1"></div>
